definition: (of medicine) to use specifically for the treatment of
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Tyranny is the secret acne acne preparation.
sentences.chinese: 是秘方配制的专治青春痘痤疮的。

sentences.english: The crime ads which are popular at first were caused by 'The specialists'who are skilled in curing STD(sex transmitted diseases) .
sentences.chinese: 犯罪广告最早成气候的，是专治难言之隐的“神医”。

sentences.english: The tandem was an unprecedented break with this historical tradition of conservative autocracy.
sentences.chinese: “串联”是对这种保守的专治传统的前所未有的突破。

sentences.english: Do you know of any clinic that specializes in skin diseases?
sentences.chinese: 你知不知道有哪间诊所是专治皮肤病的？

sentences.english: I know a doctor. He is expert in curing stroke.
sentences.chinese: 我认识一个医生，专治中风。

sentences.english: The first overwhelming generation of crime Ads are for the "highly-skilled doctors"who specialized in STDs.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪广告最早成气候的，是专治难言之隐的“神医”。

sentences.english: Experimental drugs are now available for treating some types of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目前已有几种实验性药物专治某些癌症。

sentences.english: That is a herb effective for sore throat.
sentences.chinese: 那个是功劳叶，专治咽喉肿痛。

sentences.english: Sleeping is the best cure for waking troubles.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠是良药，专治醒时愁。

sentences.english: An allergist can help identify your triggers and develop a treatment plan. Find one at aaaai.org/physref.
sentences.chinese: 过敏症专治医师可以帮你找到源头并且制定治疗方案。

definition: good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
good medicine/panacea/fig. a good solution/a good remedy (e.g. to a social problem)
a tried and tested medical prescription
to cure ills with poison (TCM)/to fight evil with evil/set a thief to catch a thief/to fight fire with fire
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
